name: Bachelor Of Divinity
description: The Bachelor of Divinity Programme equips men and women to preach, evangelize, teach and care for Godâ€™s people in knowledge and love of God. Content is delivered in lectures and practical training. In the final year, students complete a research project.

name: Bachelor Of Agricultural Science & Entrepreneurship
description:
The Bachelor of Agricultural Science & Entrepreneurship undergraduate program combines agricultural science with entrepreneurial skills to prepare students for careers in both agriculture and business. The program focuses on sustainable farming practices, agricultural technology, and the economic aspects of agriculture, alongside the development of business and management skills.
Key areas of study include crop and livestock production, soil science, agricultural economics, farm management, agribusiness, agricultural marketing, rural development, and entrepreneurship. The program also emphasizes innovation, risk management, and the development of business plans for agricultural enterprises.
Graduates are prepared to start their own agricultural businesses, work in agricultural consultancy, or manage agribusiness operations. They can also work in government agricultural departments, NGOs, or multinational agricultural companies. The program provides a solid foundation for further studies in agricultural economics, rural development, or business management.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Food Science & Technology
description:
The Bachelor of Science in Food Science & Technology undergraduate program focuses on the scientific principles behind food production, processing, preservation, and safety. It equips students with the knowledge and skills necessary to work in the food industry, ensuring that food products are safe, nutritious, and of high quality.
Key areas of study include food chemistry, food microbiology, food engineering, food processing, sensory evaluation, food safety, nutrition, and quality control. Students also learn about food laws and regulations, packaging, and food sustainability.
Graduates are prepared for careers in food production, food safety inspection, quality assurance, food research and development, and food product development. They can work in food processing companies, research institutions, government agencies, and food safety organizations. The program also provides a foundation for further studies in food science, nutrition, or food engineering.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Human Nutrition & Clinical Dietetics
description:
The Bachelor of Science in Human Nutrition & Clinical Dietetics undergraduate program focuses on the science of nutrition and the role of dietetics in health and disease management. The program prepares students to understand how food and nutrients affect human health, and it equips them with the skills to work as dietitians or nutritionists in various healthcare settings.
Key areas of study include human physiology, biochemistry, nutrition science, food chemistry, clinical nutrition, medical nutrition therapy, dietetics, public health nutrition, foodservice management, and health promotion. Students also learn about the nutritional needs of different populations, such as children, the elderly, and those with chronic illnesses.
Graduates are prepared to work as clinical dietitians, nutrition consultants, community nutritionists, or public health professionals in hospitals, clinics, wellness centers, schools, government health programs, or private practice. The program also provides a foundation for further studies in advanced nutrition, dietetics, or healthcare management.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Data Science And Analytics
description:
The Bachelor of Science in Data Science and Analytics undergraduate program focuses on the use of data to solve problems, make decisions, and uncover insights. It combines knowledge of statistics, computer science, and business intelligence to prepare students for careers in data-driven industries.
Key areas of study include data analysis, statistical methods, machine learning, big data, data visualization, data mining, programming, and algorithms. The program also covers topics such as database management, data ethics, business analytics, and predictive modeling.
Graduates are prepared for careers as data scientists, data analysts, business intelligence analysts, machine learning engineers, or statisticians. They can work in industries like finance, healthcare, technology, marketing, and consulting. The program also provides a foundation for further studies in data science, machine learning, artificial intelligence, or business analytics.

name: Bachelor Of Visual Arts And Design
description:
The Bachelor of Visual Arts and Design undergraduate program combines artistic creativity with design principles to prepare students for careers in various fields of visual arts and design. The program emphasizes both the theoretical and practical aspects of art and design, allowing students to explore different mediums and design techniques while developing their own unique artistic styles.
Key areas of study include drawing, painting, sculpture, digital media, graphic design, visual communication, typography, photography, interior design, and art history. The program also covers design principles, color theory, design software, and the business of art and design.
Graduates are prepared to work in creative industries such as graphic design, advertising, web design, animation, illustration, interior design, and visual merchandising. They can also work as freelance artists, curators, art directors, or educators. The program offers a solid foundation for further studies in specialized areas like multimedia art, digital design, or fine arts.

name: Bachelor Of Art In Graphic Design And Animation
description:
The Bachelor of Art in Graphic Design and Animation undergraduate program blends graphic design skills with animation techniques, preparing students to work in creative industries such as media, entertainment, advertising, and digital content creation. The program focuses on visual communication and the use of digital tools to create static and moving graphics.
Key areas of study include graphic design, typography, branding, animation techniques (2D and 3D), motion graphics, video editing, visual storytelling, digital illustration, visual effects (VFX), and user interface (UI) design. Students also learn design software such as Adobe Creative Suite, Cinema 4D, and other industry-standard tools.
Graduates are prepared for careers in various fields such as animation studios, advertising agencies, web design, video game development, film production, and corporate branding. They can work as graphic designers, animators, art directors, motion graphic designers, multimedia artists, or UX/UI designers. The program also provides a foundation for further studies in digital media, animation, or interactive design.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Information Technology
description:
The Bachelor of Science in Information Technology undergraduate program focuses on the study of computer systems, software development, and information systems to prepare students for careers in the growing field of technology. The program combines theoretical knowledge with practical skills in computer science, programming, and data management.
Key areas of study include programming languages, web development, database management, network administration, cybersecurity, data structures, software engineering, systems analysis, artificial intelligence, and cloud computing. The program also covers topics such as IT project management, business information systems, and digital technologies.
Graduates are prepared for a wide range of careers in IT, such as software developers, network engineers, systems administrators, data analysts, IT consultants, or cybersecurity specialists. They can work in various industries including tech companies, healthcare, finance, government, and education. The program also provides a foundation for further studies in computer science, software engineering, or information systems management.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Computer Science
description:
The Bachelor of Science in Computer Science undergraduate program focuses on the principles of computing, programming, and algorithm design. It equips students with the knowledge and skills needed to develop software, solve complex problems, and work with emerging technologies in the field of computer science.
Key areas of study include programming languages, data structures, algorithms, software engineering, computer networks, database systems, artificial intelligence, machine learning, web development, computer architecture, and operating systems. The program also covers advanced topics like cryptography, computational theory, and distributed systems.
Graduates are prepared for careers as software developers, computer programmers, systems analysts, database administrators, network engineers, or cybersecurity experts. They can work in industries such as technology, finance, healthcare, gaming, education, and research. The program also provides a strong foundation for further studies in computer science, artificial intelligence, or data science.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Electronics & Communication Engineering
description:
The Bachelor of Science in Electronics & Communication Engineering undergraduate program focuses on the principles of electronics, telecommunications, and communication technologies. It combines theoretical knowledge with hands-on experience in designing, developing, and maintaining electronic systems and communication networks.
Key areas of study include analog and digital electronics, circuit design, signal processing, communication systems, microprocessors, telecommunications, wireless networks, control systems, embedded systems, and radio frequency (RF) systems. The program also covers topics like optical communication, data transmission, networking protocols, and electronic instrumentation.
Graduates are prepared for careers in the electronics, telecommunications, and IT sectors. They can work as electronics engineers, communication engineers, network engineers, signal processing specialists, embedded systems developers, or systems designers. Industries such as telecommunications, defense, broadcasting, electronics manufacturing, and IT services offer a wide range of opportunities. The program also provides a solid foundation for further studies in electronics, communication, or related engineering fields.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Civil And Environmental Engineering
description:
The Bachelor of Science in Civil and Environmental Engineering undergraduate program combines the principles of civil engineering with environmental science to address the challenges of infrastructure development and environmental sustainability. The program prepares students to design, build, and maintain infrastructure systems while considering the impact on the environment.
Key areas of study include structural engineering, transportation engineering, water resources management, geotechnical engineering, environmental systems, waste management, environmental impact assessments, and sustainable construction practices. Students also learn about construction materials, site planning, project management, and environmental laws and regulations.
Graduates are prepared for careers in designing and constructing buildings, roads, bridges, water systems, and other infrastructure projects while integrating sustainable and environmentally responsible practices. They can work as civil engineers, environmental engineers, construction managers, urban planners, or consultants in sectors such as construction, infrastructure development, government agencies, environmental consulting firms, and research institutions. The program also provides a strong foundation for further studies in civil or environmental engineering.

name: Bachelor Of Laws
description:
The Bachelor of Laws undergraduate degree in law provides students with the foundational knowledge and skills necessary to practice law or work in legal-related fields. The program covers a broad range of legal subjects, including constitutional law, criminal law, contract law, tort law, property law, international law, and human rights law.
Key areas of study also include legal writing, legal research, ethics, dispute resolution, and legal theory. The program aims to develop critical thinking, analytical skills, and a deep understanding of legal principles and the justice system.
Graduates of the program can pursue careers as lawyers, judges, legal advisors, corporate counsels, or work in government, non-governmental organizations, or international organizations. The degree also provides a foundation for further studies in law, including master's programs or professional qualifications to practice as a solicitor or barrister.

name: Bachelor Of Agriculture
description:
The Bachelor of Agriculture undergraduate program focuses on the study of agricultural science, technology, and business to equip students with the skills and knowledge required to contribute to the sustainable development of agriculture. This program prepares graduates to address the challenges of food production, agricultural economics, rural development, and the environmental impact of farming practices.
Key areas of study include crop production, livestock management, agricultural economics, soil science, agricultural machinery, irrigation and water management, plant breeding, pest management, agricultural extension, and sustainable farming practices. The program may also cover agricultural policy, rural sociology, and agribusiness management.
Graduates are prepared for careers in farming, agribusiness, agricultural research, government agencies, or non-governmental organizations (NGOs) working in agriculture and rural development. They can work as agricultural officers, farm managers, crop specialists, livestock experts, agricultural consultants, or agronomists. The program also provides a solid foundation for further studies in specialized areas of agriculture, environmental management, or agricultural engineering.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Agriculture
description:
The Bachelor of Science in Agriculture undergraduate program provides in-depth knowledge of agricultural science and practices, focusing on the production, management, and sustainability of crops, livestock, and other agricultural systems. The program is designed to equip students with the technical and practical skills needed to address global challenges in food security, agriculture, and rural development.
Key areas of study include crop science, animal husbandry, soil science, agronomy, plant breeding, pest and disease management, agricultural engineering, irrigation systems, sustainable farming practices, and agricultural economics. Students may also study agricultural policy, farm management, rural development, and the impact of climate change on agriculture.
Graduates are prepared to work in various sectors of the agricultural industry, including farming, agribusiness, research, extension services, and government organizations. Career options include farm management, agricultural consultancy, crop production, livestock management, agricultural research, or working with NGOs focused on agricultural development. The program also provides a strong foundation for further studies in specialized areas of agriculture, environmental science, or agricultural technology.

name: Bachelor Of Agricultural Economics And Agribusiness Management
description:
The Bachelor of Agricultural Economics and Agribusiness Management undergraduate program combines principles of economics, business, and agriculture to prepare students for careers in the agricultural sector. The program focuses on the economic aspects of agriculture, including the management of agribusinesses, resource allocation, market analysis, and policy development related to the agricultural industry.
Key areas of study include agricultural economics, farm management, agribusiness marketing, rural development, agricultural finance, supply chain management, commodity trading, agricultural policy, and economic analysis of agricultural production. Students also learn about business management, entrepreneurship, and the impact of global trends on agriculture.
Graduates are prepared for careers in agribusiness management, agricultural finance, policy analysis, market research, agricultural consulting, and farm management. They can work with agricultural companies, government agencies, financial institutions, NGOs, and research organizations. The program also provides a foundation for further studies in agricultural economics, business administration, or related fields.

name: Bachelor Of Real Estate Management
description:
The Bachelor of Real Estate Management undergraduate program prepares students for careers in the real estate industry by providing knowledge and skills in property management, real estate finance, urban planning, and property development. The program focuses on the economic, legal, and management aspects of real estate and equips students to handle various challenges in the property market.
Key areas of study include property valuation, real estate investment, land law, real estate marketing, property development, urban economics, real estate finance, and property management. Students also learn about construction management, housing policy, building regulations, and the role of real estate in urban planning and development.
Graduates of this program are equipped to work in real estate development firms, property management companies, real estate agencies, urban planning departments, and financial institutions. They can take on roles such as real estate managers, property valuers, real estate agents, development analysts, and investment consultants. The program also provides a foundation for further studies in urban planning, real estate development, or business management.

name: Bachelor Of Arts In Microfinance And Community Development
description:
The Bachelor of Arts in Microfinance and Community Development undergraduate program focuses on providing students with the knowledge and skills needed to work in microfinance institutions and community development organizations. The program combines aspects of finance, social development, and entrepreneurship to help alleviate poverty and promote sustainable economic growth at the grassroots level.
Key areas of study include microfinance principles, community development theories, financial inclusion, poverty alleviation strategies, project management, entrepreneurship, rural development, social entrepreneurship, and financial literacy. Students also learn about managing microfinance institutions, loan administration, and community-based financial systems, as well as the legal and ethical aspects of working with marginalized communities.
Graduates are prepared for careers in microfinance institutions, NGOs, development agencies, and community-focused organizations. They can work as microfinance officers, community development workers, financial consultants, project managers, or social entrepreneurs. The program also offers a foundation for further studies in social development, community management, or financial services.

name: Bachelor Of Transport And Logistics Management
description:
The Bachelor of Transport and Logistics Management undergraduate program is designed to equip students with the knowledge and skills required to manage the transportation and logistics functions of businesses and organizations. The program focuses on the efficient movement of goods and people, supply chain management, and transportation systems, with an emphasis on sustainability and global trade.
Key areas of study include transportation planning, logistics management, supply chain management, inventory control, freight and cargo management, transportation economics, route optimization, international trade and transportation law, and sustainability in logistics. Students also learn about the role of technology in logistics, including software tools for supply chain management and the automation of transportation systems.
Graduates of this program are prepared for careers in transportation and logistics management, where they can work in industries such as shipping, air freight, railways, road transport, warehousing, and supply chain companies. Potential job roles include transport managers, logistics coordinators, supply chain analysts, freight forwarding agents, and distribution managers. The program also provides a strong foundation for further studies in logistics, supply chain management, or business administration.

name: Bachelor Of International Business Management
description:
The Bachelor of International Business Management undergraduate program focuses on the global aspects of business management, preparing students to navigate the complexities of international markets, global trade, and cross-cultural management. The program combines business theory with practical skills to equip students for leadership roles in multinational corporations, international trade, and global business operations.
Key areas of study include international trade and finance, global marketing, cross-cultural communication, international business law, foreign market entry strategies, global supply chain management, and multinational corporate governance. Students also learn about global economics, international business ethics, and the impact of globalization on business practices.
Graduates are prepared to work in a variety of international business environments, such as multinational companies, international trade organizations, government agencies, consulting firms, and non-governmental organizations. Career opportunities include roles such as international business managers, export/import managers, global marketing strategists, supply chain managers, and trade analysts. The program also provides a solid foundation for further studies in international business, global economics, or business administration.

name: Bachelor Of Procurement And Logistics Management
description:
The Bachelor of Procurement and Logistics Management undergraduate program focuses on the study of procurement, supply chain management, logistics, and the strategic sourcing of goods and services. It equips students with the knowledge and skills needed to manage the flow of materials, goods, and services within an organization or across industries.
Key areas of study include procurement processes, logistics management, inventory control, transportation, supply chain strategy, and contract management. The program also covers the economic, legal, and ethical aspects of procurement and logistics.
Graduates are prepared for careers in procurement management, logistics coordination, supply chain management, and operations in various sectors such as manufacturing, retail, government, and multinational corporations. The program also provides a foundation for further studies in business management, supply chain, or procurement.

name: Bachelor Of Business Administration
description:
The Bachelor of Business Administration undergraduate program provides a comprehensive foundation in business principles, management, and administration. The program covers areas such as accounting, marketing, human resource management, finance, operations, economics, and business law.
Students develop leadership, communication, critical thinking, and problem-solving skills, preparing them for managerial roles in various industries. The program also emphasizes practical applications of business theories through case studies, internships, and projects.
Graduates are well-equipped for careers in management, consulting, marketing, finance, and entrepreneurship, and the program also serves as a foundation for pursuing advanced degrees, such as an MBA.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Accounting And Finance
description:
The Bachelor of Science in Accounting and Finance undergraduate program combines accounting principles with financial management practices. It provides students with a strong foundation in financial accounting, management accounting, auditing, taxation, corporate finance, investment analysis, and financial reporting.
Key areas of study include financial accounting, financial management, cost accounting, financial analysis, taxation, auditing, and risk management. The program also covers ethics and regulatory frameworks within accounting and finance.
Graduates are prepared for careers in accounting, financial analysis, corporate finance, auditing, tax consultancy, and banking. They can work in various sectors such as accounting firms, financial institutions, government agencies, and multinational corporations. The program also provides a foundation for professional certifications like CPA (Certified Public Accountant) or ACCA (Association of Chartered Certified Accountants), as well as further studies in finance or business.

name: Bachelor Of Arts In Microfinance And Community Economic Development
description:
The Bachelor of Arts in Microfinance and Community Economic Development undergraduate program is designed to equip students with the knowledge and skills necessary to promote economic development and financial inclusion at the community level. The program combines microfinance principles with community development strategies to address poverty, enhance economic opportunities, and improve livelihoods in underserved areas.
Key areas of study include microfinance principles, financial inclusion, community development theory, entrepreneurship, poverty alleviation strategies, project management, sustainable development, and rural development. Students also learn about managing microfinance institutions, group lending models, financial literacy, and the social impact of microfinance and community economic development.
Graduates of this program are prepared to work in microfinance institutions, community-based organizations, non-governmental organizations (NGOs), government agencies, and development programs focused on economic empowerment. Potential career roles include microfinance officers, community development specialists, financial literacy trainers, project managers, social entrepreneurs, and development consultants. The program also provides a foundation for further studies in community economic development, social entrepreneurship, or finance.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Business Economics
description:
The Bachelor of Science in Business Economics undergraduate program integrates economic theory with business practices, focusing on how economic principles apply to business decision-making and the functioning of markets. The program provides students with the tools to analyze business environments, manage resources, and optimize decision-making processes in a competitive market.
Key areas of study include microeconomics, macroeconomics, business strategy, financial analysis, international business, econometrics, market structures, business forecasting, and the role of government in business. Students also explore topics such as supply and demand analysis, labor markets, financial markets, and business economics in a global context.
Graduates of the program are equipped to work in a variety of roles across different sectors, including private businesses, government agencies, financial institutions, and international organizations. Career opportunities include business analysts, financial consultants, economic advisors, market researchers, policy analysts, and corporate strategists. The program also provides a solid foundation for further studies in economics, business administration, or finance.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Development Economics
description:
The Bachelor of Science in Development Economics undergraduate program focuses on applying economic theory and principles to the development challenges faced by low- and middle-income countries. The program equips students with the knowledge and skills needed to analyze and address issues such as poverty, inequality, sustainable development, and economic growth, particularly in developing economies.
Key areas of study include development theory, poverty and inequality analysis, economic growth, policy design for development, international trade, rural development, environmental economics, microfinance, and the role of institutions in development. Students also learn about the impact of globalization, foreign aid, and the economics of education, health, and infrastructure on development.
Graduates are prepared for careers in development agencies, international organizations, government policy departments, NGOs, and research institutions. They can work as development economists, policy analysts, project managers, economic advisors, and researchers focused on development issues. The program also offers a strong foundation for further studies in economics, international development, public policy, or sustainable development.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Economics And Natural Resources Management
description:
The Bachelor of Science in Economics and Natural Resources Management undergraduate program integrates economic principles with the sustainable management of natural resources. The program focuses on how to balance economic development with the conservation and efficient use of natural resources such as land, water, energy, and biodiversity, addressing both environmental and economic challenges.
Key areas of study include environmental economics, natural resource economics, sustainability, environmental policy, ecosystem services, resource management techniques, economic modeling, climate change economics, and the role of institutions in managing natural resources. Students also learn about the economic impacts of environmental degradation, climate change, and resource depletion, along with strategies for sustainable development and conservation.
Graduates of the program are equipped to work in various sectors, including government agencies, environmental NGOs, international organizations, and private sector companies involved in natural resource management. Career opportunities include roles as environmental economists, natural resource managers, policy analysts, sustainability consultants, conservation project managers, and environmental risk assessors. The program also provides a foundation for further studies in environmental economics, sustainable development, or natural resource management.

name: Bachelor Of Public Health Promotion
description:
The Bachelor of Public Health Promotion program focuses on promoting health and preventing diseases through education, advocacy, and behavioral change strategies. It covers areas like health promotion theory, epidemiology, public health policies, health communication, and the social determinants of health. The program prepares students to design and implement health promotion programs, communicate health messages, and address environmental and behavioral factors affecting health.
Graduates can work as health promotion specialists, public health educators, community health workers, health policy analysts, or in roles within health NGOs, government agencies, or research institutions.

name: Bachelor Of Arts In English Language And Literature With Education
description: A Bachelor of Arts in English Language and Literature with Education integrates the study of English language, literature, and teaching methods. It covers linguistics, literary analysis, educational psychology, and practical teaching skills, preparing graduates for careers in education, writing, and communication, or further studies.

name: Bachelor Of Arts With Education
description: A Bachelor of Arts with Education combines studies in humanities or social sciences with professional teaching training. It equips students with subject knowledge, teaching methodologies, and classroom management skills, preparing them for careers in education or related fields.

name: Bachelor Of Arts With Kiswahili
description: A Bachelor of Arts with Kiswahili focuses on the study of the Kiswahili language, its literature, and culture, alongside teaching methodologies or applied linguistic skills. Graduates are equipped for careers in education, translation, linguistics, cultural studies, or communication fields.

name: Bachelor Of Education (Early Childhood Development)
description: A Bachelor of Education in Early Childhood Development prepares students to teach and nurture young children. It focuses on child development, learning theories, curriculum design, and classroom management for early years. Graduates are qualified for careers in early childhood education, childcare management, or curriculum development.

name: Bachelor Of Education (Primary)
description: A Bachelor of Education (Primary) equips students with the knowledge and skills to teach young learners in primary schools. It covers child development, teaching methods, curriculum design, and subject-specific pedagogy. Graduates are prepared for careers as primary school teachers, curriculum developers, or education administrators.

name: Bachelor Of Inclusive Deaf Education
description: A Bachelor of Inclusive Deaf Education prepares educators to teach and support deaf and hard-of-hearing students in inclusive learning environments. The program covers sign language, deaf culture, inclusive teaching strategies, and special needs education. Graduates are equipped to work as teachers, interpreters, or advocates in inclusive and specialized educational settings.

name: Bachelor Of Science With Education
description: A Bachelor of Science with Education combines science subjects with professional teaching training. Students gain expertise in disciplines like biology, chemistry, physics, or mathematics, alongside pedagogical skills and classroom management. Graduates are prepared for careers as science teachers, education officers, or roles in curriculum development and science communication.

name: Bachelor Of Science With Education In Agriculture
description: A Bachelor of Science with Education in Agriculture combines agricultural science with teaching methodologies. It covers topics like crop production, animal science, soil management, and sustainable agriculture, alongside educational psychology and pedagogy. Graduates are equipped to teach agriculture in schools, work in agricultural extension services, or engage in curriculum development and agribusiness training.

name: Bachelor Of Science (General)
description: A Bachelor of Science (General) provides a broad foundation in various scientific disciplines, such as biology, chemistry, physics, mathematics, or environmental science. Students have the flexibility to specialize or take a diverse range of courses. This degree prepares graduates for careers in research, industry, or further studies in specific science fields.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Computer Science
description: A Bachelor of Science in Computer Science focuses on the study of computing, programming, algorithms, and software development. It covers topics such as data structures, computer networks, artificial intelligence, and systems analysis. Graduates are equipped to work in software development, IT consulting, data analysis, cybersecurity, or pursue advanced studies in computer science.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Economics And Statistics
description: A Bachelor of Science in Economics and Statistics combines the study of economic theories and statistical methods. It covers areas like microeconomics, macroeconomics, econometrics, data analysis, and statistical modeling. Graduates are equipped to work in roles such as data analysts, economists, financial analysts, or in research and policy analysis, with opportunities in government, finance, and business sectors.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Information Technology
description: A Bachelor of Science in Information Technology focuses on the study of computer systems, software development, and IT infrastructure. It covers areas like programming, database management, networking, cybersecurity, and systems analysis. Graduates are prepared for careers in IT support, software development, network administration, cybersecurity, and other technology-related fields.

name: Bachelor Of Arts In Public Administration And Management
description: A Bachelor of Arts in Public Administration and Management focuses on the study of government policies, public management, and organizational behavior. It covers topics such as public policy, leadership, public sector economics, and administrative law. Graduates are prepared for careers in public administration, government agencies, nonprofit organizations, or roles in policy analysis and public sector management.

name: Bachelor Of Social Work And Social Administration
description: A Bachelor of Social Work and Social Administration focuses on the study of social work practices and the management of social services. It covers areas such as community development, social welfare policies, counseling, and administration of social programs. Graduates are prepared for careers in social work, community service management, counseling, or roles in nonprofit organizations and government agencies that address social issues.

name: Bachelor Of Journalism And Mass Communication
description: A Bachelor of Journalism and Mass Communication focuses on the study of media, communication, and journalism practices. It covers areas such as news reporting, broadcasting, public relations, digital media, media ethics, and media law. Graduates are prepared for careers in journalism, broadcasting, public relations, content creation, and media management in both traditional and digital platforms.

name: Bachelor Of Information Science
description:
The Bachelor of Information Science seeks to develop high quality human resources for the public and private sectors so as to maximize the utility of information in organizations. Specifically, the program seeks to produce graduates who will be able to:

-Exploit the entrepreneurial aspects of information in order to strengthen the competitiveness of the organizations.
-Collect, process, store, retrieve and make available  information necessary for the business growth of the organization so as to improve its utility and effectiveness in organizations.
-Specify, design and evaluate information systems necessary in the day today running of organizations.
-Integrate, evolve and tune information systems in organizations.
-Facilitate utilization of information to support the different levels of management in organizations.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Computer Science
description: Broadly, the program was developed to offer a unique learning experience that blends theoretical, practical and industrial skills. The students are exposed to general computer science areas like networking, programming, database management, software development and algorithms. The learners are then equipped with advanced skills in multimedia technologies, computer security and mobile applications development. Graduates of this program are particularly exposed to skills that would help them innovate new products and compete favorably in the private and public sector.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Computer Engineering
description: B.Sc. in Computer Engineering focuses on hardware, data communications and software engineering. A technical definition from ACM and IEEE-CS1 defines the computer engineering discipline as being concerned with the design and construction of computers and computer based systems i.e. the software, hardware and communication components. This programme blends theory and practice into a learning experience that develops skills applicable to complex real-world problems in the _eld of computer engineering. Students study the design of digital hardware and software including communications systems, computers and devices such as phones, MP3 players, DVRs, alarm systems, x-ray machines, and even laser surgical tools. Increasingly, CE specialists integrate customised hardware and embedded software, to improve existing technologies and invent new ones.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Software Engineering
description: A Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering focuses on the design, development, and maintenance of software systems. It covers areas such as programming, software architecture, algorithms, database management, web development, and software testing. Graduates are equipped for careers in software development, system architecture, quality assurance, and IT project management, working in various industries that rely on software solutions.

name: Bachelor Of Information Systems & Technology
description: A Bachelor of Information Systems & Technology focuses on the integration of technology with business and organizational processes. It covers areas such as systems analysis, database management, networking, information security, and IT project management. Graduates are prepared for careers in IT support, systems administration, business analysis, network management, and technology consulting in various industries.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Computer Security & Forensics
description: The Bachelor of Science in Computer Security and Forensic degree program is developed to offer a unique learning experience that blends theoretical, practical and industrial skills. The students are exposed to core computer science areas like networking, programming, database management and operating systems as well as security and forensics areas like evidence handling, evidence analysis, pattern and audit trailing, security tools / techniques, human psychology and the criminal justice system. Graduates of this program are particularly exposed to skills that help keep computer systems in organizations (private and public sector) secure, reliable and robust.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Mobile Computing & Communications
description: The Bachelor of Science in Mobile Computing and Communications programme offered by UTAMU is purposed to equip the students with both traditional and cutting edge skills in Mobile Computing and Communications, so that they can be able to be innovative and develop mobile applications and understand the technical challenges posed by current mobile devices and wireless communications and evaluate and select appropriate solutions according to user requirements. The graduates of this program are taught to become innovators as well as entrepreneurs.

name: Bachelor Of Business Computing
description: A Bachelor of Business Computing combines the study of business management with information technology. It covers areas such as business strategy, database management, software development, IT project management, and e-commerce. Graduates are prepared for careers in IT consultancy, business analysis, systems development, project management, and roles that integrate technology with business operations in various industries.

name: Bachelor Of Arts In Economics
description: This programme focuses on training the worldâ€™s development economic decision makers and managers of the future. It provides broad intellectual training in foundations of knowledge of how the economy works and offers relevant skills for the constructive use of that knowledge. It is designed to generate a body of human resource equipped with skills to identify, analyse, formulate, implement, monitor and evaluate development issues affecting society. The course facilitates students with a range of skills to deal with development problems and challenges.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Economics
description: The Bachelor of Science in Economics programme is designed for students who want to pursue a career as Economists in academia, industry, finance or government. It equips students with analytical skills to tackle the complexities of the modern world through economic analysis, modeling, monitoring and planning for both public and private organizations. They will also deal with logical analysis of social and individual decision making. Career options to graduates include; Accountants, Tax Advisers, Actuarial Work, Insurance and Trading, etc.

name: Bachelor Of Business Administration
description: The Bachelor of Business Administration programme is a unique blend of different disciplines from which a student can select one of four specialized options including; Finance and Accounting, Entrepreneurship and Business Promotion, Public/Social Sector Management and Human Resources and Organisational Development.

name: Bachelor Of Human Resource Management
description: A Bachelor of Human Resource Management focuses on the study of managing people within organizations. It covers areas such as recruitment, employee relations, compensation and benefits, performance management, labor laws, and organizational behavior. Graduates are prepared for careers in human resource management, talent acquisition, training and development, employee relations, or organizational development in various sectors.

name: Bachelor Of Arts In Development Economics
description: This programme focuses on training the worldâ€™s development economic decision makers and managers of the future. It provides broad intellectual training in foundations of knowledge of how the economy works and offers relevant skills for the constructive use of that knowledge. It is designed to generate a body of human resource equipped with skills to identify, analyse, formulate, implement, monitor and evaluate development issues affecting society. The course facilitates students with a range of skills to deal with development problems and challenges.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Quantitative Economics
description: This degree course is designed for students who want to acquire knowledge about tools and techniques of Economic variables, how to collect and analyse economic data and apply it to explain social, economic and health dynamics among others. The programme focuses on training the worldâ€™s development economic decision makers and managers of the future. This programme provides a thorough training in specific areas of economics, mathematics, statistics and computing and also enhances statistical/economic analytical techniques of personnel in the business and private sector

name: Bachelor Of Project Planning & Management
description: This degree is designed to prepare students to plan, coordinate, lead and generally manage project across a range of business areas and sectors to success, within the constraints of time, cost and quality. By blending business and leadership principles with project management strategies and skills, this degree will enable students to build the required competencies to succeed. As much as possible, the degree is aligned with the core processes found in the Guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK Guide), which is standard practice across the profession. The curriculum also provides a framework for the business functions, values, decision-making abilities, and leadership skills that will add to studentâ€™s success as a leader in project management.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Accounting & Finance
description: The Bachelor of Science in Accounting and Finance has been developed to train highly skilled and modern Accounting and Finance specialists. The programme, which is the first of its kind in the region, is blended with the Association of Certified Chartered Accountants (ACCA) and Uganda Institute of Bankers Professional Bankersâ€™ Certificate curricula. This is intended to produce unique, shrewd, analytical and widely knowledgeable graduates who will have the capacity to solve large complex accounting and financial problems and demonstrate a sound understanding of the broader business environment.

name: Bachelor Of Public Administration & Management
description:
The Bachelor of  Public Administration and Management programme is a unique blend of different disciplines from which a student can select one of three specialized options including; Local Government, Health Administration and Public Finance.
The Bachelor Public Administration and Management curriculum has been designed to equip students with skills specifically required to manage the civil service, ethics and values that guide the conduct of public affairs at all levels. This program is enriched to enable scholars to develop and improve the Public Administration and Management system in Uganda by addressing the dynamic and constantly changing environment.
The Bachelor of Public Administration and Management focuses on the performance of government in formulating and implementing public policies and is intended to prepare students to work in the various levels of government and other non-state agencies.

name: Bachelor Of Mass Communication & Journalism
description:
This programme is intended to train professional journalists and communicators who have the requisite skills not only in the broad areas of journalism and mass communication but are also ICT savvy and well grounded in issues of economics and development.
Students under this programme will specialize in any of the specialized options;
- Journalism
- Strategic Communication and Public Relations
- Career Options

name: Bachelor Of Procurement & Supply Chain Management
description:
This program prepares students to tackle business problems in the global market place and understand the complex world of logistics, supply chain and procurement industries within a continuously globalised and changing environment.
Bachelor of Procurement and Supply Chain Management has been blended with technology and management and graduates of this programme will be able to get exemptions once they enrol for professional courses in procurement and supplies like the Chartered Institute of Purchasing and Supply (UK).

name: Bachelor Of Education - Secondary
description: The Bachelor of Education Degree is designed to address the emerging trends in Education. It is designed in response to the current demands for strong first degrees in terms of academic and professional content to enable the graduates to compete competently in the ever-thinning world market. The programme aims at producing professional teachers who are specialized and competent instructors rich in content and professional knowledge. It takes into account the fact that recent global developments put heavy demands on the qualifications and continue to form a growing need for highly qualified people to teach and serve in their subject areas of specialization.

name: Bachelor Of Science With Education
description: A Bachelor of Science with Education combines science subjects with professional teaching training. Students gain expertise in disciplines like biology, chemistry, physics, or mathematics, alongside pedagogical skills and classroom management. Graduates are prepared for careers as science teachers, education officers, or roles in curriculum development and science communication.

name: Bachelor Of Arts With Education
description: A Bachelor of Arts with Education combines studies in humanities or social sciences with professional teaching training. It equips students with subject knowledge, teaching methodologies, and classroom management skills, preparing them for careers in education or related fields

name: Bachelor Of Science In Environment Management
description: The program provides students with a comprehensive understanding of environmental issues, including conservation, ecology, and sustainable resource management. Learn from experienced professionals and gain hands-on experience through field trips and research projects. With our program, youâ€™ll be prepared to take on roles in environmental management, conservation, and sustainable development, and make a positive impact on the natural environment in Uganda.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Hotel Management And Institutional Catering
description: The Bachelor of Science in Hotel Management and Institutional Catering program is designed to equip students with the essential knowledge and skills to become a leader in the field of hospitality. The program offers students a comprehensive understanding of the principles and methods of hotel management and institutional catering, including organization and administration, food and beverage management, and customer service. With the Bachelor of Science in Hotel Management and Institutional Catering, graduates will be well-equipped to take on top-level roles in the hospitality industry.

name: Bachelor Of Business Administration
description: A Bachelor of Business Administration provides a comprehensive understanding of business operations and management. It covers areas such as finance, marketing, human resource management, operations, entrepreneurship, and strategic management. Graduates are prepared for careers in business management, marketing, finance, consultancy, and other leadership roles in diverse industries or to pursue entrepreneurial ventures.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Computer Science
description: A Bachelor of Science in Computer Science focuses on the study of computing, programming, algorithms, and software development. It covers topics such as data structures, computer networks, artificial intelligence, and systems analysis. Graduates are equipped to work in software development, IT consulting, data analysis, cybersecurity, or pursue advanced studies in computer science.

name: Bachelor Of Human Resource Management
description: This degree programme is designed for those who are interested in a thorough grounding in Human Resource Management. It is suitable programme for those who intend to work as Human Resource Managers, Administrative Assistants, and Supervisors or hold any Administrative position

name: Bachelor Of Clearing And Forwarding Management
description: This is a three years programme in Clearing and Forwarding Management focussing on the Custom Clearing and Forwarding environment. It aims at equipping students with operational skills and knowledge which would enable them to effectively carry out functions related to clearing and forwarding.   It is suited for learners already employed in the industry or for those wishing to embark on a career in Customs Clearing and Forwarding. It is also suited to Importers and Exporters who wish to know more about the role their Customs, Clearing and Forwarding Agents play in the handling of shipments and customs clearing and forwarding procedures.

name: Bachelor Of Procurement And Logistics Management
description: This program is designed to prepare students for careers in the procurement profession. It gives students a solid foundation that allows them the opportunity to appreciate and practice ethical procurement. Because procurement is becoming a solid discipline in global logistics and Supply Chain Management, this degree will support career growth in the logistics and Supply Chain field. At Nkumba University, this program prepares students to manage and/or administer the processes by which a firm or organization contracts for goods, services or works to support its operations

name: Bachelor Of Office Management And Secretarial Studies
description: This programme is designed in such a way that students are equipped with secretarial, managerial and administrative skills and values. It targets those interested in office related roles, such as Secretaries, Executive Assistants, Administrative Assistants, Office Managers and Personal Assistants.

name: Bachelors Of Records And Information Management
description: This programmeis designed to equip Archivists and Records Managers working in todayâ€™s business; government and non-government organizations with relevant records and information management skills and values.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Fisheries Management And Technology
description: This program provides students with a strong foundation in the biological, ecological, and technological principles of fisheries management, and includes courses on fish culture, aquaculture, fish processing, and conservation. Students will also gain hands-on experience through field trips, laboratory work, and practical projects. Our experienced instructors bring real-world experience to the classroom, providing students with a well-rounded education that prepares them for success in the workforce. Graduates will be well-prepared for careers in government agencies, non-governmental organizations, and the private sector.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Petroleum And Minerals Geoscience
description: This program provides students with a strong foundation in the geological, geophysical and geochemical principles of petroleum and minerals exploration, including courses on sedimentology, stratigraphy, structural geology, and remote sensing. Students will also gain hands-on experience through field trips, laboratory work, and practical projects. Our experienced instructors bring real-world experience to the classroom, providing students with a well-rounded education that prepares them for success in the workforce. Graduates will be well-prepared for careers in government agencies, non-governmental organizations, and the private sector.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Wildlife And Forestry Management
description: Due to overexploitation of the wildlife resource base, the wildlife course form Nkumba University is designed to train, skill and promote the next generation of wildlife managers, conservationists, researchers, scholars, and wildlife law enforcement officials at the highest scientific level in a truly inter-disciplinary and multi-cultural harmonious environment to tackle conservation challenges.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Tourism Operations Management
description: Bachelor of Science in Tourism Operations Management focuses on developing knowledge and skills in managing tourism businesses, services, and operations. It equips students with expertise in areas such as travel planning, hospitality management, cultural tourism, event organization, and sustainable tourism practices. The program combines theoretical knowledge with practical applications to prepare graduates for careers in tourism-related industries, ensuring they can adapt to the dynamic demands of the global travel and tourism sector.

name: Bachelors Of Science In Cybersecurity And Digital Forensics
description: The Bachelor of Science in Cybersecurity and Digital Forensics program at Nkumba University provides a holistic approach to understanding and combating cyber threats. Spanning over four years, the program covers essential concepts, practical skills, and cutting-edge technologies related to cybersecurity and digital forensics. Students will delve into various subjects, including network security, cryptography, cyber laws, computer forensics, incident response, and ethical hacking.

name: Bachelor Of Arts In Development Studies
description: Bachelor of Arts in Development Studies focuses on understanding and addressing global and local development challenges, including poverty, inequality, economic growth, and sustainable development. The program combines knowledge from economics, sociology, political science, and environmental studies to equip students with the analytical and practical skills needed to promote social and economic progress.

name: Bachelor Of Arts In Community Based Development
description: The programme has been developed to equip participants with appropriate skills, knowledge and understanding of development issues for handling social and economic problems, managing programmes, community training and education, handling vulnerable groups and reducing poverty, programme challenges and opportunities related to communities.

name: Bachelor Of Arts In Public Administration And Management
description: The degree provides candidate with the understanding and skills necessary to apply the knowledge of Public Administration and Management as a societal function attending to information resources, human resources, capital resources and all other factors of production. The manner in which these public resources can be productively, efficiently and perhaps efficiently managed to produce the good service so that man lives a good life is a main concern of this programme.

name: Bachelor Of Arts In Social Work And Social Administration
description:
The programme has been carefully developed to equip participants with appropriate skills, knowledge and understanding of social issues, programmes, challenges and opportunities related to our communities. The course therefore exposes students to both theoretical and practical experiences in relation to social problems. The theoretical component presents the relevant theoretical orientations on the nature of social development needs, interventions and challenges.
Second and third year students are required to undertake internship trainings during the vacation following the second semester. The practical component of the course programme provides students with the opportunity to transform the knowledge and skills acquired in class into practical abilities. The student will attain integral development, including the capacity to build and use relationships, knowledge, imagination, opportunities, influence, time and ability to work under challenging circumstances in transforming society as change agents.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Journalism & Public Relations
description: Our program is designed to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of the field of journalism, including the ethical and legal considerations of reporting, as well as the principles of public relations. Our curriculum covers topics such as news writing, reporting, media ethics, and crisis communication. Our experienced faculty will provide you with the knowledge and practical skills necessary to excel in the field of journalism and public relations.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Public Health
description: Our program is designed to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of public health issues and the skills necessary to address them. Our curriculum covers topics such as epidemiology, health promotion, and disease prevention. Our experienced faculty will provide you with the knowledge and practical skills necessary to make an impact in public health.

name: Bachelors In Information Systems And Technology
description: The Bachelor of Information Systems and Technology program at Nkumba University provides students with a comprehensive understanding of the strategic use of technology in modern organizations. Over the course of four years, students will explore a wide range of subjects, including database management, programming, systems analysis and design, project management, cybersecurity, and emerging technologies. This program blends theoretical knowledge with hands-on experience, ensuring graduates are well-prepared to tackle real-world challenges in the field.

name: Bachelor Of Arts In Security Studies
description: The Bachelor of Arts in Security Studies program at Nkumba University provides students with a comprehensive understanding of security dynamics, global threats, and strategies to mitigate risks. This multidisciplinary program encompasses subjects such as international relations, political science, law, conflict resolution, intelligence analysis, and cybersecurity. Students will develop a deep understanding of the political, social, economic, and technological factors that shape security environments.

name: Bachelor Of Laws
description: Our program is designed to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of the legal system and its application in real-world scenarios. Our experienced faculty, cutting-edge curriculum, and focus on practical skills training will equip you with the knowledge and skills needed to succeed in a competitive job market. With a reputation for excellence, Nkumba University is the top choice for students looking to pursue a career in law in Uganda.

name: Bachelor Of Criminal Justice (BCJ)
description: The Bachelor of Criminal Justice (BCJ) program focuses on the study of crime, law enforcement, legal systems, and corrections. It provides students with the knowledge and skills needed to understand criminal behavior, implement justice policies, and work in various roles within the criminal justice system. The program blends theoretical knowledge with practical training to prepare graduates for careers in law enforcement, legal services, and public safety.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Animation And Visual Effects
university: International Business, Science And Technology University (ISBAT)
description: The Bachelor of Science in Animation and Visual Effects focuses on equipping students with the technical and creative skills required to create animated content, visual effects (VFX), and digital media. This program combines art, design, and technology, enabling students to produce high-quality digital animations, CGI (computer-generated imagery), and visual effects for industries such as film, gaming, advertising, and virtual reality.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Applied Information Technology
university: International Business, Science And Technology University (ISBAT)
description: Bachelor of Science in Applied Information Technology (BSc-AIT) offers new challenges when compared to the traditional computing environment. This course focus on the recent emergence of global business, new technologies for data processing and data communication/ networking environment. Eventually, motivate science graduates to focus on professional careers in Information Technology. B-Sc-AIT is intended to provide the students with adequate theoretical and applied skills which will enable them to effectively solve the complex problem of the IT industry.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
university: International Business, Science And Technology University (ISBAT)
description: The Bachelor of Science in Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning (AI & ML) program equips students with the theoretical knowledge and practical skills to design, develop, and deploy intelligent systems. It combines core concepts of computer science, mathematics, data analysis, and specialized AI/ML techniques, preparing graduates for careers in cutting-edge technology fields.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Networking And Cyber Security
university: International Business, Science And Technology University (ISBAT)
description: The Bachelor of Science in Networking and Cyber Security focuses on equipping students with the skills and knowledge needed to design, implement, and manage secure computer networks while addressing cybersecurity challenges. The program integrates networking principles with cybersecurity techniques to prepare graduates for protecting data and systems against digital threats.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Computer Science
university: International Business, Science And Technology University (ISBAT)
description: The Bachelor of Science in Computer Science is a versatile program that equips students with the theoretical and practical knowledge to design, develop, and analyze software and systems. It provides a strong foundation in computer programming, algorithms, and systems, preparing graduates for diverse careers in technology and software development.

name: Bachelor Of Medical Laboratory Technology
university: International Business, Science And Technology University (ISBAT)
description: The Bachelor of Medical Laboratory Technology (BMLT) program trains students to become skilled healthcare professionals capable of performing various laboratory tests and analyses to aid in the diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of diseases. The program aims to provide students with comprehensive theoretical knowledge, practical skills, and hands-on experience in laboratory techniques, instrumentation, quality assurance, and laboratory management. Through a combination of coursework, laboratory sessions, clinical rotations, and internships, students will develop the expertise necessary to work effectively in clinical laboratories, research laboratories, diagnostic centers, hospitals, and public health agencies.

name: Bachelor Of Medical Imaging Technology
university: International Business, Science And Technology University (ISBAT)
description: The Bachelor of Medical Imaging Technology (BMIT) program trains students to become skilled healthcare professionals capable of producing high-quality medical images for diagnostic and therapeutic purposes. The program aims to provide students with comprehensive theoretical knowledge, practical skills, and clinical experience in various medical imaging modalities, including radiography, computed tomography (CT), magnetic resonance imaging (MRI), ultrasound, and nuclear medicine. Through a combination of coursework, laboratory sessions, clinical rotations, and internships, students will develop the expertise necessary to operate imaging equipment safely and accurately, interpret medical images, and collaborate with healthcare teams to provide optimal patient care.

name: Bachelor Of Business Administration In International Business
university: International Business, Science And Technology University (ISBAT)
description: This program equips students with the foundational and advanced knowledge of international business practices, including global trade laws, international finance, strategic planning, and cross-cultural management. This program aims to prepare graduates for successful careers in global corporations, international organizations, or as entrepreneurs in the international market.

name: Bachelor Of Business Administration In International Marketing
university: International Business, Science And Technology University (ISBAT)
description: This program aims to provide students with an in-depth understanding of global marketing strategies and practices, focusing on market research, brand management, digital marketing, and consumer behavior in an international context. Graduates will be prepared to address the challenges of marketing across borders and cultures.

name: Bachelor Of Hospitality And Tourism Management
university: International Business, Science And Technology University (ISBAT)
description: The Bachelor of Hospitality and Tourism Management (BHTM) program is designed to provide students with the knowledge and skills needed for leadership roles in the hospitality and tourism industries. The program combines business principles with specialized training in hospitality and tourism operations, preparing graduates to manage hotels, resorts, travel agencies, and tourism-related businesses.

name: Bachelor Of Hotel Management
university: International Business, Science And Technology University (ISBAT)
description: This program aims to prepare students for leadership roles in the hospitality industry by providing a blend of operational and managerial knowledge in hotel and related hospitality services. It focuses on service management principles, hospitality operations, and business strategies specific to the hospitality sector.

name: Bachelor Of Human Resource Management
university: International Business, Science And Technology University (ISBAT)
description: The Bachelor of Human Resource Management (BHRM) program is designed to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of the principles and practices of managing human resources (HR) in organizations. The program focuses on equipping students with the skills to manage recruitment, employee relations, compensation, performance management, and organizational development to create productive and harmonious work environments.

name: Bachelor Of Commerce
university: International Business, Science And Technology University (ISBAT)
description: This program provides students with a comprehensive understanding of commerce, accounting, finance, taxation, and management principles. This program is designed to prepare graduates for a wide range of careers in business, finance, and accountancy, offering the skills needed to contribute effectively to organizations of all sizes.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Applied Economics
university: International Business, Science And Technology University (ISBAT)
description: The Bachelor of Science in Applied Economics program focuses on using economic theory and quantitative methods to analyze real-world problems and provide practical solutions. The program equips students with skills in data analysis, economic modeling, and decision-making, preparing them to apply economic principles in various sectors such as business, government, and international organizations.

name: Bachelor Of Engineering In Electronics And Communication
university: International Business, Science And Technology University (ISBAT)
description: The Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics and Communication program focuses on the study of electronic devices, circuits, communication systems, and the integration of electronics with communication technologies. The program combines theoretical knowledge and practical skills to prepare students for careers in the design, development, and maintenance of electronic systems and communication networks.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Computer Engineering
university: International Business, Science And Technology University (ISBAT)
description: The Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering program combines principles of computer science and electrical engineering to design and develop computer systems, hardware, and software. The program prepares students for careers that involve working with both hardware (e.g., processors, circuit boards) and software (e.g., operating systems, application software) in the creation of computing devices and systems.

name: Bachelor Of Business Administration
description: The Bachelor of Business Administration at the Faculty of Business and Management of the International University of East Africa is the most popular programme in the faculty.  It prepares students to provide practical business solutions to the problems facing various business sectors.  The BBA progarmme is designed to train and equip students with the skills that suit the needs of the changing business environment. The courses offered in the programme aim at equipping students with leadership and management skills to enable its graduates to competently manage modern business enterprises with better prospects. The management of modern enterprises requires specialized competences to be more effective, efficient and competitive. The BBA programme provides an opportunity for students to select from three specialized areas namely; Finance & Banking, Marketing, and Accounting.

name: Bachelor Of Human Resource Management
description: The Bachelor of Human Resource Management of the Faculty of Business and Management at the International University of East Africa prepares students to manage employees in all types of organizations.  It is oriented towards producing students who will be able to apply human resource management functions to a work based environment and exhibit a higher level of professionalism in tackling human resource issues towards organisational performance, efficiently and effectively.  The emphasis of this course is on the ability of the graduates to acquire knowledge, skills and competencies to enable them survive in the business environment with little or no difficulty. Further to that students will appreciate Human capital as the most important asset of many firms.  The programme enables students to apply key concepts and techniques that managers need to know in order to best attract, retain and develop skilled personnel, based on current practice and theory in Human Resources Management. Legal and ethical considerations in human resource management are also emphasized.

name: Bachelor Of Procurement & Logistics Management
description: The Bachelor of Procurement and Logistics Management degree of the Faculty of Business and Management at the International University of East Africa emphasizes on the strategies for distribution and supply of goods and services.  It focuses on the core skills and is work oriented so as to deliver the program with more emphasis on practical aspects of the procurement function and innovative approach to issues that are relevant in todayâ€™s business environment.

name: Bachelor Of Tourism Operations And Management
description: The Bachelor of Tourism Operations and Management degree of the Faculty of Business and Management at the International University of East Africa aims at producing highly, but broadly inter-disciplinary oriented professionals in aspects of tourism and hospitality planning, development and management. The programme emphasizes; problem-based; project oriented; work-based and practical/field based learning.  After completion of the training, the tourism and hospitality management graduates will be equipped with competencies (knowledge, skills and attitudes) in planning, development and management of tourism, leisure and recreation resources in ways that enhance sustainable tourism and general development. The target will be to produce tourism graduates that are consciously and attitudinally oriented to practical, field, development and extension tourism work.

name: Bachelor Of Information Technology
description: The Bachelor of Information Technology (BIT) program is designed to provide students with the technical skills, knowledge, and practical experience needed to manage and develop information technology (IT) systems, networks, and software. This program emphasizes a broad understanding of computer science, programming, systems administration, and IT infrastructure, preparing students for a wide range of IT-related careers.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Computer Science
description: The Bachelor of Science in Computer Science (BSCS) is a versatile program that equips students with the theoretical and practical knowledge to design, develop, and analyze software and systems. It provides a strong foundation in computer programming, algorithms, and systems, preparing graduates for diverse careers in technology and software development.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Environmental Science And Management
description: The programme is based on a combination of practical and theoretical course components making it highly relevant to the needs of Uganda and  Africaâ€™s  various  industries.  It  is  designed  to  train  students  to orientate  their perception of environmental challenges in order to appreciate the key role of sciences, economics, ethics, politics, and sociology in environmental conservation and management. The programme provides students with a firm science foundation, and training and mentorship in application of scientific principles to identify, define problems and design tools for data collection, analyse, interpret and generate information that can offer solutions to environmental challenges. In doing so, a new cadre of environmental professionals will emerge to confront the current environmental challenges at local and international levels.

name: Bachelor Of Science In Software Engineering
description: The BSc. Software Engineering course at IUEA is designed to give students  skills and knowledge in the latest and emerging trends in software engineering and to be able to apply this in problem solving capacities in real world organisational contexts.
